name: [SA Game Jam]CyberWorks
description:
Set in an afrofuturistic cybernetic repair shop, you are tasked to tend to customers by repairing their damaged cyberware, or make a quick buck switching out parts while they aren't aware.

Good work= money = more tools = more complicated jobs

Basic mechanics are in, you can manipulate parts with different tools. 
Still need to do a dialogue system for interacting with customers.
I really want to make this an Augment Reality operating game

Game Dev: @jwho303
Art: @artofmailowness
Music:@palmdrive
Sound: Yan
